    Japamala Resorts Sdn Bhd (Tioman Island) Job Vacancies 2021 - Maintenance Officer

    February 17, 2021

    TOC

    • Vacancy
    • How To Apply

    Japamala Resorts Sdn Bhd (Tioman Island) job vacancies 2021 for Maintenance Officer position which based in Mersing. Jawatan kosong Japamala Resorts Sdn Bhd (Tioman Island) 2021 terkini untuk kekosongan Maintenance Officer penempatan di Mersing.

    Vacancy

    • Maintenance Officer

    SAMADHI RETREATS is more than a luxury hospitality group. We recognise that each of our locations are unique and offer an opportunity to be a part of the community, while supporting the local culture and minimising our impact on the environment. The group comprises of two award-winning properties in Malaysia; Japamala Resort, a 16-villa resort in Tioman Island, and Villa Samadhi Kuala Lumpur, a villa-in-a-room urban retreat. In Singapore, the group owns Villa Samadhi Singapore, a 20-room restored colonial residence located in Labrador Nature Reserve.

    Positions available at Japamala-Tioman Island (Accommodation Provided)

    Job Responsibilities:

    • Perform fixes for electrical and plumbing related issues.
    • Install necessary appliances and equipment as needed
    • Check control panels and electrical wiring to identify and fix issues
    • Complete regular maintenance tasks, such as replacing light bulbs, Aircon Servicing, etc.
    • Service and Maintain electrical fittings
    • Inspect and troubleshoot various equipment and systems

    Job Requirements:

    • Applicant must possess at least a Secondary/SPM Level of education or equivalent
    • A professional certificate in electrical/plumbing, Diploma or Bachelors Degree in related field is an added advantage
    • Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
    • Ability to multi-task and coordinate within different departments
    • Ability to communicate fluently in English and Bahasa Malaysia and ability to work with all level of staff.
    • At least 1 year of maintenance experience in a resort/hotel setting
    • Ability to work shifts, weekends and Public Holidays
    • Ability to walk long and high distance daily
    • Chargeman qualification an added advantage
    • Able to work at Japamala Resorts, Pulau Tioman

    Job Type: Full-time

    Salary: RM2,000.00 - RM2,500.00 per month

    Benefits:

    • Health insurance
    • Meal provided

    Schedule:

    • Rotational shift

    Experience:

    • maintenance: 1 year (Preferred)

    COVID-19 Precaution(s):

    • Remote interview process
    • Temperature screenings
    • Social distancing guidelines in place
    • Virtual meetings
    • Sanitizing, disinfecting, or cleaning procedures in place

    How To Apply

    Are you looking for new challenge and job opportunity in hotel industry this 2021 ? Just apply this Maintenance Officer job online through Indeed Malaysia Apply Online
